Map.update:
update B2BBUSI.T_APP_S_PRPSPLANFEE_DAY
USERCODE = #usercode:VARCHAR#
REALPAYDATE = #realpaydate:TIMESTAMP#
PAYREFFEE = #payreffee:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_CAR = #payreffeeCar:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_NOCAR = #payreffeeNocar:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_ACC = #payreffeeAcc:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_HEA = #payreffeeHea:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_M_S = #payreffeeMS:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_M_S_C = #payreffeeMSC:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_M_S_NC = #payreffeeMSNc:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_M_S_A = #payreffeeMSA:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_M_S_H = #payreffeeMSH:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_Y_S = #payreffeeYS:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_Y_S_C = #payreffeeYSC:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_Y_S_NC = #payreffeeYSNc:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_Y_S_A = #payreffeeYSA:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_Y_S_H = #payreffeeYSH:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_L_M = #payreffeeLM:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_L_M_C = #payreffeeLMC:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_L_M_NC = #payreffeeLMNc:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_L_M_A = #payreffeeLMA:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_L_M_H = #payreffeeLMH:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_L_MS = #payreffeeLMs:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_L_MS_C = #payreffeeLMsC:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_L_MS_NC = #payreffeeLMsNc:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_L_MS_A = #payreffeeLMsA:DECIMAL#
PAYREFFEE_L_MS_H = #payreffeeLMsH:DECIMAL#
UPDATEDATE = #updatedate:TIMESTAMP#
ATTRIBUTE1 = #attribute1:VARCHAR#
ATTRIBUTE2 = #attribute2:VARCHAR#
ATTRIBUTE3 = #attribute3:VARCHAR#
ATTRIBUTE4 = #attribute4:VARCHAR#
ATTRIBUTE5 = #attribute5:VARCHAR#
ATTRIBUTE6 = #attribute6:VARCHAR#
where ID = #id:DECIMAL#

update B2BBUSI.T_APP_S_PRPSPLANFEE_DAY set USERCODE = #usercode:VARCHAR#, REALPAYDATE = #realpaydate:TIMESTAMP#, PAYREFFEE = #payreffee:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_CAR = #payreffeeCar:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_NOCAR = #payreffeeNocar:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_ACC = #payreffeeAcc:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_HEA = #payreffeeHea:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_M_S = #payreffeeMS:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_M_S_C = #payreffeeMSC:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_M_S_NC = #payreffeeMSNc:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_M_S_A = #payreffeeMSA:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_M_S_H = #payreffeeMSH:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_Y_S = #payreffeeYS:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_Y_S_C = #payreffeeYSC:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_Y_S_NC = #payreffeeYSNc:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_Y_S_A = #payreffeeYSA:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_Y_S_H = #payreffeeYSH:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_L_M = #payreffeeLM:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_L_M_C = #payreffeeLMC:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_L_M_NC = #payreffeeLMNc:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_L_M_A = #payreffeeLMA:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_L_M_H = #payreffeeLMH:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_L_MS = #payreffeeLMs:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_L_MS_C = #payreffeeLMsC:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_L_MS_NC = #payreffeeLMsNc:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_L_MS_A = #payreffeeLMsA:DECIMAL#, PAYREFFEE_L_MS_H = #payreffeeLMsH:DECIMAL#, UPDATEDATE = #updatedate:TIMESTAMP#, ATTRIBUTE1 = #attribute1:VARCHAR#, ATTRIBUTE2 = #attribute2:VARCHAR#, ATTRIBUTE3 = #attribute3:VARCHAR#, ATTRIBUTE4 = #attribute4:VARCHAR#, ATTRIBUTE5 = #attribute5:VARCHAR#, ATTRIBUTE6 = #attribute6:VARCHAR# where ID = #id:DECIMAL#
Map.select:
SELECT USERCODE, SUM(NVL(PAYREFFEE,0)) PAYREFFEE, SUM(NVL(PAYREFFEE_CAR,0)) PAYREFFEE_CAR, SUM(NVL(PAYREFFEE_NOCAR,0)) PAYREFFEE_NOCAR, SUM(NVL(PAYREFFEE_ACC,0)) PAYREFFEE_ACC, SUM(NVL(PAYREFFEE_HEA,0)) PAYREFFEE_HEA FROM B2BBUSI.T_APP_S_PRPSPLANFEE_DAY WHERE USERCODE = #userCode:VARCHAR#
AND REALPAYDATE=TRUNC(SYSDATE-1)
AND REALPAYDATE<=TRUNC(SYSDATE-1) AND REALPAYDATE>=TRUNC(SYSDATE,'IW')
AND REALPAYDATE<=TRUNC(SYSDATE-1) AND REALPAYDATE>=TO_DATE(#searchMonth:VARCHAR#,'YYYYMM') AND REALPAYDATE<=LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#searchMonth:VARCHAR#,'YYYYMM'))
AND REALPAYDATE>=TRUNC(SYSDATE-1,'YEAR') AND REALPAYDATE<=TRUNC(SYSDATE-1)
AND REALPAYDATE>=TRUNC(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)),'YEAR') AND REALPAYDATE<=TRUNC(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)))
AND REALPAYDATE>=TO_DATE(#searchStartDate:VARCHAR#,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND REALPAYDATE<=TO_DATE(#searchEndDate:VARCHAR#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
GROUP BY USERCODE

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT USERCODE, PAYREFFEE_M_S PAYREFFEE, PAYREFFEE_M_S_C PAYREFFEE_CAR, PAYREFFEE_M_S_NC PAYREFFEE_NOCAR, PAYREFFEE_M_S_A PAYREFFEE_ACC, PAYREFFEE_M_S_H PAYREFFEE_HEA FROM B2BBUSI.T_APP_S_PRPSPLANFEE_DAY WHERE USERCODE = #userCode:VARCHAR# AND REALPAYDATE<=TRUNC(SYSDATE-1) AND REALPAYDATE>=TO_DATE(#searchMonth:VARCHAR#,'YYYYMM') AND REALPAYDATE<=LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#searchMonth:VARCHAR#,'YYYYMM')) ORDER BY REALPAYDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT USERCODE, PAYREFFEE_Y_S PAYREFFEE, PAYREFFEE_Y_S_C PAYREFFEE_CAR, PAYREFFEE_Y_S_NC PAYREFFEE_NOCAR, PAYREFFEE_Y_S_A PAYREFFEE_ACC, PAYREFFEE_Y_S_H PAYREFFEE_HEA FROM B2BBUSI.T_APP_S_PRPSPLANFEE_DAY WHERE USERCODE = #userCode:VARCHAR#
AND REALPAYDATE>=TRUNC(SYSDATE-1,'YEAR') AND REALPAYDATE<=TRUNC(SYSDATE-1)
AND REALPAYDATE>=TRUNC(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)),'YEAR') AND REALPAYDATE<=TRUNC(LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)))
ORDER BY REALPAYDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1
